page.title: 12SURVEY OF JOBS PART 1
page.content: We asked each child in school their parents jobs.These are our results. 4 dads are business men,a mother and father are dentists.There is a mother,cleaner,a father who is a factory worker.A dad who is in the Navy,6 salesmen,a father who makes seats for theatres.5 catering mums.2 children whose fathers sing,4 dads are in the building trade.One dad is an author.4 secretary mums and 1 dad.1 father,health inspector,and one civil servant.One mum a sewing club leader.2 father serveyors,a mother dance teacher,4 dads are engineers,1 dad is an architect.One dad is a stock taker another is a computer programmer ,a mum and dad work in a garage.2 mums are Tourist Guides.Two dads work in a P.O/shop,1 mum is a postmaster,2 dads are carpenters,1 is a T.V man.2 mums are playgroup assistants.
